name: 6.18 "Let Sleeping Drakes Lie" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was Frasier's patient he told the gang about?
questions.correct: a woman aroused by men who dance
options: a woman who is addicted to sex
a woman who thinks she's Cleopatra
questions.explanation:
a woman aroused by men who dance.

	When a female patient comes into Cheers, Sam starts to act like he can dance. Woody actually believed Sam was a dancer.

Norm.

	Norm was painting Evan Drake's bedroom while Evan was away in Europe. Rebecca had told Evan that Norm could paint getting him a job.

questions.text: Who wanted to see Evan's bedroom?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Rebecca was dying to see the place where Evan slept. When she got there she was acting so weird Norm asked if he should leave the room.

questions.text: What was the name of the girl Sam liked?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer McCall.

	Jennifer McCall was played by Cec Verrell. She once played a hooker in the 1984 movie "Runaway".

questions.text: How did Evan return from Europe?
questions.explanation:
unexpectedly.

	Rebecca was scared that Evan would return unexpectedly from Europe and Norm assured her that wouldn't happen. Then he said "It's Evan, he's back unexpectedly from Europe."

questions.text: Who got left in the closet?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Everyone kept saying to Norm, "You just left her in the closet." Norm got annoyed by this and threatened to hurt the next person who said it.

questions.text: What was the other patient Frasier treated?
questions.explanation:
pyromaniac.

	Sam found this out a little too late. He heard sirens after Frasier told him she was a pyromaniac. It was not said, but implied that perhaps she lit his car on fire.

questions.text: Who told Evan there were killer bees?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Norm was trying to get Evan to leave his room so Rebecca could get out of the room. Evan wasn't buying the story about the killer bees however.

questions.text: What did Evan check for on Norm?
questions.explanation:
lobotomy scar.

	Norm told him he didn't have a fever and Evan said, "No I'm checking for the lobotomy scar." Evan thought Norm was insane because he wouldn't let him sleep.

Rebecca.

	Norm was about to tell Evan the truth when Rebecca bit him. She was afraid that if Evan found her in his bedroom she would lose her job, and she would lose her chance to date him.
